file_utils module¶

file_utils.chdir_to_file_dir(filename)¶

Changes the working directory to be the same as the one containing filename.

Parameters

filename (str) – the filename

Example

>>> os.getcwd()
'/pathto/RadarCoverage'
>>> chdir_to_file_dir(__file__)
'/pathto/RadarCoverage/radarcoverage'
file_utils.json_load(filename, *args, **kwargs)¶

Read a dictionary from a json format file.

Parameters

  • filename (str) – the filepath

  • args (any) – positional arguments to be passed to json.load()

  • kwargs – keyword arguments to be passed to json.load()

Returns

the dictionary

Return type

dict

file_utils.json_save(filename, data, *args, indent=4, **kwargs)¶

Writes a dictionary into a json format file.

Parameters

  • filename (str) – the filepath

  • data (dict) – the dictionary

  • args (any) – positional arguments to be passed to json.dump()

  • indent (int) – indentation size

  • kwargs – keyword arguments to be passed to json.dump()
